name: postgresql
description: PostgreSQL is a powerful open-source relational database management system featuring advanced SQL capabilities, extensions, robust concurrency, and replication. It runs on all major platforms and supports extensive integrations.
features: ACID compliance: Ensure data integrity with full support for atomic transactions, consistency, isolation, and durability.
Advanced SQL: Execute complex queries with support for CTEs, window functions, JSON operations, and full-text search.
Extensibility: Add custom functions, data types, and operators using procedural languages like PL/pgSQL and PL/Python.
Replication: Implement high availability with streaming replication, logical replication, and failover capabilities.
Partitioning: Improve query performance on large tables with declarative partitioning and automatic partition management.
Foreign data wrappers: Query external data sources including other databases, files, and APIs as if they were local tables.
JSONB support: Store and query JSON documents with indexing and efficient binary storage format.
Concurrent access: Handle thousands of concurrent connections with MVCC for non-blocking reads and writes.
PostGIS extension: Add geospatial capabilities for storing and querying geographic data with spatial indexes.
Performance optimization: Utilize query planner, parallel queries, and JIT compilation for optimal execution speed.
Security features: Protect data with SSL connections, row-level security, and comprehensive authentication methods.
Backup and recovery: Ensure data safety with point-in-time recovery, continuous archiving, and backup tools.
